name: CallStack
description:
Alex is a 29-year-old game developer who is struggling to balance
work and life. Lately, Alex has been working so much that they
have started seeing game elements in real life.

As you are navigating through their routine, you’ll be able to choose
what actions to take... or not to.

Call Stack features 3 endings for Alex - all depending on your
judgment! There might even be an extra secret ending...

This game was created by a team of 12 students.
